meanings.definition: A bridge designed for pedestrians to cross over a road or body of water.
meanings.sent1: The footbridges in the park allow people to safely cross the river.
meanings.sent2: We walked across the footbridges to get to the other side of the highway.
meanings.sent3: The footbridges were so narrow that only one person could cross at a time.
meanings.sent4: The footbridges acted like magical pathways over the busy streets below.
meanings.sent5: The footbridges swayed slightly in the wind, adding excitement to our journey.
